channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lots of potholes across the road, 21st January
item.description:
The holes are getting bigger and bigger. No possibility of avoiding them when cars come in front
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog Mess appearing daily, 21st January
item.description:
A very large dog is repeatedly being allowed to foul the grass verge immediately beside the public footpath (see attached photo). This is extremely unpleasant for pedestrians and reflects badly on responsible dog owners. Some action such as clear signage or monitoring would be appreciated to help address this ongoing issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, The Cloisters, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic cone and roadworks sign left behind, 21st January
item.description:
Abandoned on the grass by the hedge in the attached photo

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Large pothole in road close to drain, 21st January
item.description:
Next to drain in road close to 1 Southcourt Drive, Leckhampton. Has been there a couple weeks but is getting bigger and with cars parking on opposite side of road makes it near impossible to avoid driving into.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Southcourt Drive, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is dropping dead wood this area has high footfall during school time, 21st January
item.description:
Outside 126 station road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 126, Station Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple large potholes joining up over a metre in length, 21st January
item.description:
Outside greyhound pub, multiple potholes where surface is falling apart. Over a metre in length some as they are joining up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greyhound Gardens, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
